company_name: GLOBAL WEB GURU DIGITAL SERVICES PVT LTD
company_address: E922, Ganesh Glory 11,, Gota, Ahmedabad, India, 382470
my_business: Global Web Guru Digital Services Pvt Ltd. Founded in 2013 by Ravi Rana, Global Web Guru specializes in performance-driven digital marketing. We focus on maximizing ROI through targeted strategies in SEO, PPC, and eCommerce growth. Our expert team crafts customized campaigns that drive measurable results, enhance online visibility, and optimize ad spend. With a strong foundation in data analytics and performance marketing, we empower businesses to achieve scalable growth. Serving clients globally, we’re committed to transforming your digital presence into a powerful revenue-generating machine.
top_product: ➤ Performance Marketing & Lead Generation – High-quality leads through targeted Meta (Facebook & Instagram) Ads, Google Ads, and LinkedIn Ads. ➤ E-commerce Growth & Amazon Sales Acceleration – Scaling businesses on Amazon, Flipkart, and Shopify with strategic advertising and product optimization. ➤ Website Development & Landing Page Optimization – Creating high-converting websites and landing pages designed for maximum lead generation. ➤ Social Media Marketing & Brand Awareness – Engaging content strategies, influencer collaborations, and paid social campaigns to enhance visibility. ➤ Digital Marketing Training & Consulting – Helping business owners and individuals master performance marketing and digital sales strategies.
ideal_referral: ➤ Business owners and decision-makers looking to scale through performance marketing, lead generation, and digital growth strategies. ➤ Interior designers, real estate developers, and high-ticket service providers seeking qualified leads and high-converting marketing solutions. ➤ E-commerce brands and Amazon sellers aiming to increase sales, optimize their store, and run high-ROI ad campaigns on platforms like Amazon, Flipkart, and Shopify. ➤ Companies in need of website development, social media marketing, or expert-driven digital strategy to boost their online presence.
top_problem_solved: ➤ Struggling with Lead Generation? Helped businesses generate high-quality, conversion-focused leads through targeted performance marketing strategies. ➤ Low Sales on Amazon & E-commerce Platforms? Scaled brands on Amazon, Flipkart, and Shopify with optimized product listings, PPC campaigns, and strategic growth plans. ➤ Website Not Converting Visitors into Customers? Designed and optimized high-performance websites and landing pages to maximize lead capture and sales. ➤ Social Media Not Driving Business Growth? Developed and executed engaging social media strategies that increased brand awareness and customer engagement. ➤ Business Owners Lacking Digital Marketing Knowledge? Provided hands-on training and consulting to help businesses leverage digital marketing effectively.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of the most powerful experiences I’ve had in BNI was witnessing the true impact of Givers Gain in action. A fellow BNI member, an interior designer, was struggling to get high-value projects despite having great expertise. Through our chapter, I connected him with a real estate developer looking for premium interior solutions. What started as a simple referral turned into a long-term partnership, generating business worth lakhs. Not only did it help him scale his business, but it also reinforced the power of meaningful connections and trust that BNI fosters. This experience made me realize that BNI is not just about networking; it’s about building relationships that create real business opportunities. Every meeting, every referral, and every 1-2-1 conversation holds the potential to change someone’s business journey. BNI Crypto is not just a chapter—it’s a community that supports, grows, and wins together.
